items.title: 7-Zip
items.content_html: Version 24.09 published on 2024-11-29. The summary of changes are: The latest release includes optimizations and improvements for performance and support across multiple platforms, and updated installers for Windows, Linux, and macOS.

items.title: awscli2
items.content_html: Version 2.24.8 published on 2023-10-05. The summary of changes are: Added expanded property maps for Location APIs, Network Firewall Automated Domain List feature, Mail Manager archive capabilities, CPU task limit updates for ECS, and r8g instance support to SageMaker.

items.title: azurecli
items.content_html: Version 2.69.0 published on 2023-02-11. The summary of changes are: The latest release includes security updates, performance improvements, and minor bug fixes to enhance stability and functionality.

items.title: bicepcli
items.content_html: Version 0.33.93 published on 2025-01-29. The summary of changes are: Addresses language server crash, deployment failures for looped resources, and releases the deployment pane as a non-experimental feature.

items.title: bruno
items.content_html: Version 1.39.0 published on 2025-02-14. The summary of changes are: The latest update introduces NTLM authentication, improved expression handling, a rearrangement feature for table items, and additional support for cheerio and xml2json as built-in libraries. The release also includes UI enhancements, variable ordering, and fixes for several bugs across the system.

items.title: clink
items.content_html: Version v1.7.10 published on 2023-02-07. The summary of changes are: Added new Lua API unicode.char() for Unicode codepoints and a clink-diagnostics-output command for troubleshooting. Fixed #721, resolving potential crashes related to console window width.

items.title: dbeaver
items.content_html: Version 24.3.5 published on 2025-02-16. The summary of changes are: This release includes the latest bug fixes and performance improvements for the DBeaver Community Edition. It maintains its free and open-source accessibility.

items.title: dive
items.content_html: Version v0.12.0 published on 2024-02-02. The summary of changes are: This version adds features for vulnerability detection in Docker layers, provides enhanced compatibility with Docker 25+, and includes fixes for issues with analyzing local images and installation improvements.

items.title: docker-desktop
items.content_html: Version 4.38.0 published on 2025-01-30. The summary of changes are: This release includes support for multi-node Kubernetes clusters, Bake functionality becoming generally available, and updates to various Docker components including Docker Engine and Docker Compose.

items.title: Build Apps SDK
items.content_html: Version 6.0.428 published on November 12, 2024. The summary of changes are: This is the latest and final stable release of .NET 6.0 SDK with all necessary updates and fixes. It includes the components required to build and run .NET applications. It is recommended to transition to newer supported versions.

items.title: Build Apps SDK
items.content_html: Version 8.0.406 published on February 11, 2025. The summary of changes are: This release includes the latest updates and bug fixes to ensure improved performance and enhanced developer experience.

items.title: drawio
items.content_html: Version 26.0.9 published on 2025-01-27. The summary of changes are: Uses electron 32.2.5. Updates to draw.io core 26.0.9. All changes from 26.0.8 to 26.0.9 are added.

items.title: etlp2pcapng
items.content_html: Version v1.11.0 published on 2023-06-08. The summary of changes are: Improved handling of pktmon captures for better usability and functionality.

items.title: ffmpeg
items.content_html: Version 7.1 published on 2024-09-30. The summary of changes are: FFmpeg 7.1 'PÃ©ter' introduces the latest library updates and stability improvements from the 7.1 release branch. It represents the newest stable release, offering various new features and optimizations. This version ensures better compatibility and performance for multimedia projects.

items.title: gateway
items.content_html: Version 2024.3.3 published on 2025-02-13. The summary of changes are: The Gateway 2024.3.3 is out with minor updates.

items.title: git-win
items.content_html: Version 2.48.1.windows.1 published on 2025-02-13. The summary of changes are: This release comes with Git v2.48.1, updates to MinTTY and MSYS2 runtime, and removes i686 installer support. It also includes important bug fixes and deprecates `git svn` support to improve maintainability.

items.title: cli
items.content_html: Version v1.53.0 published on 2025-02-14T15:20:04Z. The summary of changes are: This release includes new features like update checks, canceling CI pipelines, and --raw options for diffs. Documentation improvements and environmental variable updates were also added. Additionally, several bug fixes and refactoring improvements were implemented.

items.title: gitlab release cli
items.content_html: Version v0.22.0 published on 2025-02-17T10:50:07Z. The summary of changes are: This release merges branch 'release-0-22-0' into 'master' for improved functionality and stability.

items.title: gitlab-runner-agent
items.content_html: Version v17.9.0 published on 2025-02-20. The summary of changes are: Updated changelog for the release. Refer to the official changelog for detailed updates.

items.title: golang
items.content_html: Version 1.24.0 published on Not explicitly mentioned. The summary of changes are: The latest stable release includes improvements for performance and compatibility across platforms.

items.title: golang1.21
items.content_html: Version 1.21.13 published on 2024-08-06. The summary of changes are: This release includes fixes to the go command, the covdata command, and the bytes package.

items.title: golang1.22
items.content_html: Version 1.22.12 published on 2025-02-04. The summary of changes are: Includes security fixes to the crypto/elliptic package and bug fixes to the compiler and the go command.

items.title: golang1.23
items.content_html: Version 1.23.6 published on 2025-02-04. The summary of changes are: Includes security fixes to the crypto/elliptic package, along with bug fixes to the compiler and the go command.

items.title: helm
items.content_html: Version v3.17.1 published on 2025-02-12. The summary of changes are: This is a patch release addressing various bug fixes and improvements. Users are encouraged to upgrade for the best experience. Join the Kubernetes Slack community for discussions and updates.

items.title: inkscape
items.content_html: Version 1.4 published on 2024-10-13. The summary of changes are: Inkscape 1.4 introduces features like a Filter Gallery with previews, modular grids, an improved Swatches dialog, and customizable handles. It also offers faster extensions, new templates, and Affinity Designer File Import support. Numerous enhancements and bug fixes further improve the user experience.

items.title: IntelliJ IDEA
items.content_html: Version 2024.3.3 published on 2025-02-12. The summary of changes are: This release includes improvements to Maven project synchronization, enhanced screen reader detection on Windows startup, and properly displayed custom toolbar icons after an IDE restart.

items.title: jmeter
items.content_html: Version v5.6.3 published on 2024-01-07. The summary of changes are: Latest stable release includes bug fixes and performance improvements. Updates ensure better stability and enhanced compatibility for various use cases. Recommended for all users.

items.title: jq
items.content_html: Version 1.7.1 published on 2023-12-13. The summary of changes are: Fixes for buffer overflows, improved CLI options, and enhanced memory management. Includes updates for JSON parsing and better compatibility with JSON specifications. Documentation and build processes have also been refined, alongside contributions from new maintainers.

items.title: kubectl
items.content_html: Version 1.32.2 published on 2025-02-11. The summary of changes are: Kubernetes 1.32.2 is the latest stable release, featuring improvements and bug fixes to ensure reliability and performance. It includes patches that enhance overall system stability. For detailed changes, refer to the release notes.

items.title: make-win
items.content_html: Version 3.81 published on 2006-11-25. The summary of changes are: This release provides a stable version of the GNU make utility for maintaining groups of programs, ensuring automation of program builds using makefiles.

items.title: maven
items.content_html: Version 3.9.9 published on 2025-02-19. The summary of changes are: Apache Maven 3.9.9 introduces the latest features and critical bug fixes, making it the recommended version for all users. It ensures compatibility with JDK 8 or above, while retaining support for older JDKs with toolchains. This version continues to emphasize robustness and user-friendliness.

items.title: miniconda
items.content_html: Version 25.1.1-2 published on 2025-02-11. The summary of changes are: Includes updates to conda-anaconda-tos version 0.1.2 and various bug fixes to improve stability and performance.

items.title: node
items.content_html: Version 18.20.6 published on 2025-01-21. The summary of changes are: This release includes minor updates and improvements for better stability and performance.

items.title: node16
items.content_html: Version 16.20.2 published on 2023-08-08. The summary of changes are: Latest stable release with maintenance updates and security fixes.

items.title: node18
items.content_html: Version v18.20.6 published on 2025-01-21. The summary of changes are: Latest stable release for Node.js 18 with critical fixes and performance improvements.

items.title: node20
items.content_html: Version 20.18.3 published on 2025-02-10. The summary of changes are: This release includes updates related to stability and performance improvements for Node.js 20.

items.title: node22
items.content_html: Version v22.14.0 published on 2025-02-11. The summary of changes are: This release includes enhancements and bug fixes for better stability and performance.

items.title: notepad-plus-plus
items.content_html: Version 8.7.7 published on 2025-02-07. The summary of changes are: Version 8.7.7 addresses a regression in v8.7.6 related to specific SCN_MODIFIED notifications for plugins and introduces the NPPM_ADDSCNMODIFIEDFLAGS API.

items.title: openshift
items.content_html: Version 4.17.0-okd-scos.0 published on 2024-12-16. The summary of changes are: This release introduces OKD 4.17 with updates copied from okd-scos repository, along with upgrade notes for transitioning from OKD 4.15 clusters. Client tools with preconfigured binaries are included for seamless installation.

items.title: oraclejdk11
items.content_html: Version 11.0.26 published on 2025-01-21. The summary of changes are: JDK 11.0.26 introduces new features such as debugging enhancements with thread and timestamp options, improved historical timezone data, and security updates. Notable bug fixes include enhancements for screen capture on Wayland and improved process argument handling on Windows.

items.title: oraclejdk17
items.content_html: Version 17.0.14 published on 2025-01-21. The summary of changes are: This update includes IANA Time Zone Data 2024b, security fixes, and improvements to string concatenation and argument quoting on Windows processes. It is aligned with Java SE Specification version 17.1.

items.title: oraclejdk21
items.content_html: Version 21.0.6 published on 2025-01-21. The summary of changes are: JDK 21.0.6 includes updates to the IANA timezone data to version 2024b, implements ProcessBuilder argument quoting enhancements for Windows, and resolves multiple security and functionality issues to ensure stability.

items.title: oraclejdk8
items.content_html: Version 8u441 published on 2025-03-04. The summary of changes are: The latest stable release, JDK 8u441, includes critical updates and fixes introduced from previous builds. It provides enhancements for security and performance improvements in GA, PERF, and BPR builds. This version ensures better support for enterprise and cloud environments.

items.title: powershell
items.content_html: Version 7.5.0 published on 2025-01-23. The summary of changes are: This release includes build and packaging improvements, updates to .NET SDK 9.0.102, and enhancements in GitHub and NuGet pipelines. It also ensures the assembly version remains unchanged for servicing releases. Documentation and help content have been updated as well.

items.title: putty
items.content_html: Version 0.83 published on 2025-02-08. The summary of changes are: This release includes updates and fixes aimed at improving stability and functionality. Users are advised to consider using development snapshots for access to the latest changes.

items.title: python
items.content_html: Version 3.13.2 published on 2025-02-04. The summary of changes are: Python 3.13.2 includes bug fixes and improvements to enhance performance and stability. It is the latest stable release recommended for production environments. Check the release notes for detailed changes.

items.title: python3.10
items.content_html: Version 3.10.16 published on 2024-12-03. The summary of changes are: This release includes security changes and bug fixes for existing features to maintain stability.

items.title: python3.11
items.content_html: Version 3.11.11 published on 2024-12-03. The summary of changes are: This release includes security updates and bug fixes to ensure a stable and secure Python 3.11 experience.

items.title: python3.12
items.content_html: Version 3.12.9 published on 2025-02-04. The summary of changes are: This release includes important bug fixes and minor improvements to enhance the stability and functionality of Python 3.12.

items.title: python3.9
items.content_html: Version 3.9.21 published on 2024-12-03. The summary of changes are: Latest bugfix and security updates for Python 3.9 addressing critical issues.

items.title: rider
items.content_html: Version 2024.3.5 published on 2025-02-07. The summary of changes are: This release introduces improved AI-assisted cloud completion for C#, supports Anthropic's latest Claude models, and restores the Go to Class functionality for better navigation.

items.title: screentogif
items.content_html: Version 2.41.1 published on 2024-09-08. The summary of changes are: Updated Chinese, Turkish, Arabic, and Dutch localizations. Fixed various issues, including Move Left/Right commands and a typo in the stop recording message. Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.

items.title: task
items.content_html: Version v3.41.0 published on 2025-01-18. The summary of changes are: Fixed critical issues like dynamic variable handling, added new features like TASK_DIR special variable, and improved internal refactoring for stability.

items.title: terraform
items.content_html: Version 1.10 published on prior date of release. The summary of changes are: Includes enhancements and fixes such as S3-native state locking, Azure backend improvements, and various bug fixes enhancing stability and functionality.

items.title: vscode
items.content_html: Version 1.97.2 published on 2025-02-13. The summary of changes are: This recovery update resolves critical issues. For detailed release notes, refer to Updates on code.visualstudio.com.

items.title: windows-terminal
items.content_html: Version 1.22.10352.0 published on 2023-02-06. The summary of changes are: Windows Terminal 1.22 is marked as stable and includes a completely rewritten console hosting implementation, enhanced support for grapheme clusters, and a new UI for pop-ups in CMD and Python. It also introduces regular expression search and snippets for quick command playback.

items.title: winmerge
items.content_html: Version 2.16.46 published on 2025-01-27. The summary of changes are: This is a stable release that includes various bug fixes, such as ALT-F4 behavior, drawing issues on launch, and enhancements to folder and plugin comparisons. Translation updates and manual corrections are also part of this release. It replaces earlier stable releases as the recommended version.

items.title: wireshark
items.content_html: Version 4.4.4 published on unknown. The summary of changes are: The latest stable version, 4.4.4, supersedes all previous releases and includes the most up-to-date features and fixes for Wireshark.

items.title: yq
items.content_html: Version v4.45.1 published on 2025-01-12. The summary of changes are: Create parent directories when --split-exp is used and updated dependencies for smoother functionality.
